Nama Produk:
Kobe 4 Protro
Metallic Gold and Dark Obsidian
Deskripsi:
Inspired by the team's redeeming run in Beijing, this edition of the Kobe 4 Protro returns with the same winning spirit and accolades to prove it. A shining mix of Metallic Gold and Neutral Grey dress up the lightweight, layered upper, while Dark Obsidian accents and high-gloss finishes add some well-earned lustre. 

And of course, the Protro comes equipped to perform. It's been re-tooled for a smooth, responsive sensation underfoot, while the padded collar and Flywire cables work to help contain your foot. Soft yet resilient, the foam midsole and Air Zoom in the heel create a comfortable feel with energy return. To finish off this special design, the number 10 is stamped into the heel—honouring Kobe's jersey number from the team's legendary 2008 run.

Sabrina Ionescu's pursuit of excellence requires a shoe that can keep up with both her work ethic and will to win. Enter the Sabrina 3. Its lightweight, secure upper helps keep her supported with cables, allowing her to shift, slide and step back with confidence. This Light Blue design with precise white hits speaks to Sabrina's blueprint that all hoopers can abide by. With its extra-durable rubber outsole, this version gives you traction for outdoor courts.


Colour Shown: Glacier Blue/Light Armoury Blue/Still Blue/Metallic Gold
Style: HF2882-400
Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

The Kobe 3 Protro is a 2007 design re-tooled with modern day technology. It's unmistakable diamond-inspired pattern serves as a subtle nod to Kobe's oldest daughter. This silhouette is built for those who have an endless obsession with the game and use every opportunity to polish their skills. You're welcome.


Colour Shown: White/White/White
Style: HM4351-100
Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

When Luka's not on the court, there's a good chance he's gone camping. This Luka .77 celebrates that pastime with a rugged design that helps you take your game outdoors. High abrasion mesh and a full-length rubber outsole stand up to concrete and asphalt, giving you a shoe that can handle any court.


Colour Shown: Light Silver/Black/Coconut Milk/Hyper Crimson
Style: HF0819-003
Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

A durable indoor-outdoor basketball with a true feel.
Take your skills from the hardwood to the blacktop and vice versa. This adidas basketball works indoors as well as outdoors, so you don't have to worry about bringing the wrong ball to hoop. The durable cover feels smooth and true to the touch to give you that accurate feel from catch to release.

A reversible jersey designed for enhanced breathability.
Attack the hoop in versatile comfort in this basketball jersey. The reversible jersey features a mesh build with contrast 3-Stripes on one side and a durable doubleknit build on the other. Built to control airflow on every possession, it's made of moisture-wicking fabric for elevated ventilation.

A durable indoor/outdoor basketball.
Get in the game. Take this adidas basketball for a pickup game on the hardwood or the blacktop. The soft and durable rubber feels true with every bounce and catch of the ball, whether you're practising on your own or p

Comfortable basketball shoes with plush cushioning.
Play comfortably from tipoff till the last whistle. These juniors' adidas basketball shoes have a textile upper with soft leather touches that complement the look. The Cloudfoam midsole makes every step soft and plush, so you can snag the rebound and run the break with ease.

Signature shoes from Damian Lillard and adidas Basketball.
Damian Lillard manipulates the game like nobody else. The Dame X, the latest signature shoe from adidas Basketball and Damian Lillard was designed specifically to let Dame be Dame. A lightweight textile upper provides breathability for elevated performance, while three-dimensional printed accents support the zones of the shoe where it is most needed. Multi-directional traction on the rubber outsole and an ultralight Lightstrike midsole help you generate speed and make dynamic cuts through the lane with superstar confidence. Signature colourways and Dame logos celebrate the milestones in the life and career of one of basketball's most celebrated players.

Signature shoes from adidas Basketball and Anthony Edwards.
Celebrate one of the game's rising stars with the latest signature trainers from adidas Basketball and Anthony Edwards. These performance basketball shoes are all about supporting the high-flying, high-speed action that has made Edwards an international superstar. Combining the energy-return of BOOST and the ultra-lightweight cushioning of Lightstrike, these shoes are designed for players who dominate with their speed and athleticism. Anthony Edwards logos complete the signature look.

adidas Pro Block Shorts
Performance basketball shorts made with recycled materials.
Max out your performance in these adidas Pro Block Shorts. Infused with style and energy, these basketball shorts elevate your game from lay-up lines to buzzer beaters. AEROREADY manages moisture to keep you dry through every crossover and step-back jumper, while the loose fit gives you room to roam the court with confidence. This product is made with 100% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

A loose, hooded half-zip with style inspired by baller Anthony Edwards.
Anthony Edwards is known for his devastating game on the court and his style off of it. This adidas basketball pullover lets you rep his personal vibe while expressing yourself on the scene. Made from woven polyester with a loose, roomy fit, this half-zip has ribbed cuffs to keep the sleeve steady and a built-in hood that flips up when you need some extra coverage. Layer on this anorak for something light and loose that you can layer over a tee or jersey with ease. Great with basketball shorts, jeans, fleece and more.

Lightweight basketball shoes built for speed.
Lightweight and comfortable, the Adizero Select 3.0 shoes from adidas Basketball keep you moving. Lightstrike cushions each stride without adding weight while the textile upper elevates your comfort level. Whether you're dominating a five-on-five at the park or pushing the pace during a league game, these basketball shoes won't slow you down on your mission to the rack.

Signature shoes from adidas Basketball and Damian Lillard.
Change is inevitable for a game-changing superstar like Damian Lillard. The latest Signature shoes from Dame and adidas Basketball embrace the spirit of evolution that took Dame from overlooked and under-rated to the highest level of basketball in the world. The all-new design of these performance shoes is lighter and more streamlined, pairing the snug fit of an internal bootie with a full-length Torsion bar for lateral stiffness and an ultra-lightweight Lightstrike midsole underfoot to keep you moving at top speed. Designed for outstanding lockdown, they provide effortless support for all your most dynamic on-court moves so just like Dame you can break the game wide open.

A crewneck t-shirt with subtle basketball graphics.
Show your passion for the game of basketball with this adidas graphic tee. The minimalist design on the back displays your love for the sport. Whether you're playing a pickup game or catching some hoops on TV, this shirt lets you rep your favourite sport in comfort and style.

Signature shoes from adidas Basketball and James Harden.
Continuing to build on his legend and legacy, the latest signature shoes from James Harden and adidas Basketball are designed for players who live for the game's biggest moments. These performance basketball shoes are designed to support the type of moves that have made Harden a superstar on the hardwood and are loaded with the unique sense of style that has helped make his name off the court too. A combined BOOST and Lightstrike midsole provides lightweight energy return to propel you towards the hoop, while the rubber outsole gives you all the traction needed to pull up and drain threes from deep.

Signature shoes from Donovan Mitchell and adidas Basketball.
Game-changing superstars like Donovan Mitchell are constantly evolving. The latest signature shoes from Donovan Mitchell and adidas Basketball highlight how Don has grown from a flashy bucket-getter to an all-around player who makes the game easier for everybody on his team. These performance basketball shoes feature the ultra-lightweight cushioning of Lightstrike along with a uniquely designed outsole that provides zoned traction for outstanding responsiveness. The now-iconic Spida logo completes the look.

Bold basketball shorts with recycled materials.
Move freely and take your game to new heights in the adidas Crazy Lite Short. The loose fit allows for full range of motion as you drive to the hoop, while an allover print and adidas Basketball branding let everyone know these are built for the court. Front pockets can hold your small essentials when game time is over. This product is made with 100% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

Lightweight shorts with a reversible design.
Sometimes you need to switch it up on the hardwood. These basketball shorts feature sweat-wicking fabric to sweep moisture away from your skin. Built in a reversible design, one side is made of breathable polyester mesh and the other side is durable polyester doubleknit.

Pants made in collaboration with Anthony Edwards.
Step into a mindset of comfort with these Anthony Edwards sweat pants from adidas. The relaxed pants are made of soft French terry fabric that keeps you comfortable for hours on end. Large 3-Stripes on one hip is as bold as Ant-Man's high-flying style of play.

Signature basketball shoes from Damian Lillard and adidas.
These juniors' Dame Certified 3 shoes from adidas Basketball are designed for serious hoopers. The lightweight build keeps you flying across the court while Bounce cushioning softens each landing. No matter if running through drills at practise or dreaming of knocking down buzzer beaters, signature Dame graphics inspire big game confidence every time you lace up and hit the court.

A cotton t-shirt for fans of Anthony Edwards.
Rep your favourite rising star with this Anthony Edwards from adidas. This graphic tee celebrates the dynamic play and infectious energy of one of the game's most entertaining players. Made from soft, breathable single jersey fabric, the loose fit offers plenty of room through the shoulders for free movement on or off the court.

Signature trainers from adidas Basketball and Anthony Edwards.
Lace up in the style of one of the game's emerging superstars. These signature trainers from adidas Basketball and Anthony Edwards are built for certified bucket getters. The combined BOOST and Lightstrike midsole is ultra-lightweight and adds outstanding energy return to your most explosive moves. A rubber outsole provides all the support you need to attack the hoop, while signature Anthony Edwards branding completes the look.

A cotton t-shirt for on and off the hardwood.
Represent for adidas Basketball wherever you go in this t-shirt. It's made from cotton single jersey fabric that's soft to the touch and is cut to fit loose so you can get a full range of motion on your jump shot or elevate your comfort on a night out with friends. An adidas Basketball 3 Bar logo on the front completes the look. This tee was made using UNITEFIT â€” an all-gender fit system that was created with a spectrum of sizes, genders and forms in mind.

Meet the Helix Travel Backpack, your ultimate companion for athletic adventures. Engineered for the dynamic athlete, this backpack boasts a wealth of storage options to keep all your gear organized and easily accessible. With dedicated compartments for shoes, clothing, and personal essentials, plus a sleek design for effortless travel, the Helix ensures you’re always prepared to tackle your next challenge with ease and style. Travel smart, stay organized, and keep your focus on the game.

Elevate your game with the Evolution Gearpack, crafted for modern athletes who need both style and practicality.

The bag features a clip-on single ball bag for easy access during training. The spacious main compartment is designed to hold a basketball, a pair of shoes, and extra gear, ensuring you're fully equipped for any session. Plus, a dedicated shoe pocket keeps your footwear separate and secure.

Whether you're heading to the gym or hitting outdoor courts, the Evolution Gearpack has you covered. Step up your game and experience top-tier basketball gear.

Take your game to the next level with the Chris Brickley Evolution Basketball Bag. Designed for the modern basketball player, this basketball bag blends style with functionality seamlessly.

Stay prepared with the additional clip-on single ball bag, ensuring you have everything you need for intense training sessions. Plus, the spacious main compartment includes a dedicated internal shoe pocket, keeping your footwear safe and separate.

Whether you're hitting the gym or the outdoor courts, the Chris Brickley Evolution Basketball Bag has you covered. Elevate your game and embrace the evolution of basketball.

The Wilson Authentic 6 Ball Travel Bag is equipped with three internal compartments providing space for up to 6 basketballs and additional equipment. Rectangular design makes transportation easy. Customize with your team logo.

There's enough to keep track of as a coach. Your equipment shouldn't be a concern. With an easy shoulder strap and the ability hold up to 8 balls, The All Sport Ball Bag will keep you prepared to help your team prepare for greatness.

The Wilson NBA DRV Sport Bag allows you to take your game anywhere while helping the earth. It utilizes heavy duty drawstring cords for easy open and closure and features a spacious main compartment that's large enough to fit an official size basketball, all made with partly recycled materials.

The Wilson WNBA Heir Sport Bag allows you to take your game anywhere. It utilizes heavy duty drawstring cords for easy open and closure, an exterior zipper pocket for added storage and a spacious main compartment that's large enough to fit an official size basketball.

The Wilson Duffel is ready when the road calls. Top opening flap and adjustable straps allow you to carry as a backpack or duffle bag for an easy travel experience. A Thermo-Guard pocket for snack storage to keep your energy high, and ample cargo space for all your game-day gear. Come prepared with Wilson.
Built to carry the most important part of the game, this Deluxe Rack is constructed for easy access and to make warm-ups as simple as possible.
The Wilson NBA Forge Chain Net is built to handle your ambition on the court. Rust proof, it endures all weather conditions, is the official size and fits all standard size basketball rims.

Nama Produk: NBA DRV Recreational Red, White and Blue Net
Deskripsi: The Wilson NBA DRV Recreational Red, White and Blue Net is made for endless play. Suitable for indoor and outdoor courts, in the official size, the styled red, white and blue adds nostalgia to any court.
Bring the authentic feel to any court with the Wilson NBA Authentic Performance Net. Weighing 180 grams, this heavy duty, easily installed, NBA branded net is suitable for indoor and outdoor courts.

The little things are the big things in this game. It all starts with how you train from the ground up, especially your footwork. Using our Pro Training Ladder you can improve your footwork just as the pros do. Choose from multiple rung lengths to fit your drills and when you’re done store it away in a compact bag.
Make your vision and share your plan on the spot with The NBA Coaches Dry Erase Board.

Nama Produk: NBA & WNBA Pro Training Guard Extender
Deskripsi: Elevate your players training with the Wilson NBA/WNBA Pro-Training Guard Extender. Dual branded with NBA and WNBA markings, this guard extender is suitable for all players and helps coaches and trainers simulate various defensive positions without extraneous movements.

Practice with a plan and purpose, executing accurately with this set of 10 Pro-Training Cones. Hone your skillset with precise movement around these cones throughout your drills. Their updated 9 inch height makes them easier for pick up between drills, along with a wider base to maintain their set position on the court. They are constructed with Impact Plastic for additional durability and longevity to last drill after drill and practice after practice.

Hit the pad before you hit the paint. This Pro-Training Block Pad helps to safely simulate in-game contact while absorbing impact with high-density foam. Built to better suit the user it boasts 5 strategically placed reinforced handles for various contact drills.

Never shoot in an empty gym again when you use the Pro-Training Stationary Defender. Simulating on-court defenders you can build your skills while experiencing an in-game feel. The lightweight design makes for quick transitions from drill to drill all practice long. Its collapsible design makes for easy transport to and from the gym.

Nama Produk: 2024-2025 NBA Team City Edition Icon Basketball
Deskripsi: Ask any player who they do it for, and it's always the city they call home. The Wilson NBA City Edition Icon Basketball expresses team pride in the cleanest terms possible. Each basketball is draped in your team's colors and marked with a throwback logo to where it all began. Use it indoors or out with the outdoor All Surface cover marked in all the details inspired by the official NBA jerseys for the 24-25 season.

Show the world who you cheer for on game day with the Wilson NBA Team Premiere basketball. It's made for indoor and outdoor play or to proudly display your team's pride. Embroidered team logos pop against the black faux-snakeskin-embossed cover.

Nama Produk: Advanced Grip Control Composite Indoor/Outdoor Basketball
Deskripsi: Premium Composite Cover with a soft tack for exceptional ball controll and pebbled channels for advanced grip control.

The Spalding Promo Tee is a great choice for an everyday wardrobe. Cut from lightweight single jersey fabric, it offers great comfort with a classic style and features a small Spalding logo on the chest. Perfect for gym, running, or casual wear.

100% cotton.

Constructed with lightweight and breathable closed mesh, the shirt features contrast inserts and a Spalding print FIBA badge size to ensure a great performance. Smartbreathe MESH technology provides enhanced ventilation while also offering a freedom of movement.

Get ready to take on the court with these performance pants.

100% Polyester.

Nama Produk: FIBA Legacy TF-1000 Composite Indoor Basketball
Deskripsi: Built for the most clutch moments, the Spalding LEGACY TF-1000 has no equal. It’s NFHS approved and used by some of the top college and high school programs in the country. From crossovers to pulling up from the logo, the LEGACY TF-1000’s moisture management capabilities create a dry surface for ultimate ball control. The wet grip microfiber composite cover has a game-ready feel right out of the box and provides an elite moisture-wicking surface so the ball plays at the same high level from tip off to crunch time. Lift your game to new heights with the best-in-class LEGACY TF-1000.
